Name: Moonlighter
Description: Moonlighter is an Action RPG with rogue-lite elements that demonstrates two sides of the coin � revealing everyday routines of Will, an adventurous shopkeeper that secretly dreams of becoming a hero.

Name: Night in the Woods
Description: NIGHT IN THE WOODS is an adventure game focused on exploration, story, and character, featuring dozens of characters to meet and lots to do across a lush, vibrant world.

Name: Hustle Cat
Description: You are Avery Grey, the newest employee at a popular cat cafe called A Cat's Paw. The coffee's good and the staff is friendly (and kinda cute!) but mysterious. One day, you find a strange book in the basement, with letters you can't quite read...

Name: Divinity: Original Sin 2 - Definitive Edition
Description: The critically acclaimed RPG that raised the bar, from the creators of Baldur's Gate 3. Gather your party. Master deep, tactical combat. Venture as a party of up to four - but know that only one of you will have the chance to become a God.

Name: Dragon Age: Origins - Ultimate Edition
Description: Explore a stunning world, make complex moral choices, and engage in bone-crushing combat against massive and terrifying creatures. The Ultimate Edition includes Dragon Age: Origins, Dragon Age: Origins - Awakening and all nine content packs.

Name: My Time at Portia
Description: Start a new life in the enchanting town of Portia! Restore your Pa's neglected workshop to its former glory by fulfilling commissions, growing crops, raising animals, and befriending the quirky inhabitants of this charming post-apocalyptic land!

Name: The Technomancer
Description: The Technomancer is a sci-fi RPG that offers players plenty of dynamic combat action based on 4 skill trees dedicated to 3 combat styles and the destructive electrical powers of the Technomancers.

Name: Stardew Valley
Description: You've inherited your grandfather's old farm plot in Stardew Valley. Armed with hand-me-down tools and a few coins, you set out to begin your new life. Can you learn to live off the land and turn these overgrown fields into a thriving home?

Name: Ironheart
Description: Pilot and customize a giant iron war mech in this alternate medieval history! The Papacy, Caliphate, and the Mongols are at war, and they all have mechs.

Name: Newfound Courage
Description: You're a young man named Alex who arrives in the cliffside town of Silverpine. Explore the town's many mysteries and meet its colourful townsfolk, while you grow closer to a kind-hearted local named Jake. Can the two of you save the town from the impending doom brewing inside the mysterious Vault?

Name: Vampyr
Description: London, 1918. You are newly-turned Vampyr Dr. Jonathan Reid. As a doctor, you must find a cure to save the city�s flu-ravaged citizens. As a Vampyr, you are cursed to feed on those you vowed to heal.

Name: Love is Dead
Description: Being a zombie isn't easy. At least your love is a zombie too. Adventure together around the world and solve puzzles, evade ghosts, eat humans and fight pirates. (Who are also humans, I guess...), all to find your beloved pets.

Name: These nights in Cairo
Description: Otome visual novel. Margaret Dawson is girl dreaming to become full-fledged archaeologist. Together with her father she departs to the excavations of mysterious tomb in Egypt, but there she faces some oddities.

Name: Purrfect Date - Visual Novel/Dating Simulator
Description: As Cat Island�s newest arrival, it�s not long before you realise something�s seriously amiss, or should we say� amorous! A blend of mystery, intrigue and wickedly black humour, will you discover your Purrfect Date before it�s too late? Remember, curiosity killed the cat...

Name: Tacoma
Description: Tacoma is a sci-fi narrative adventure from the creators of Gone Home. Set aboard a high-tech space station in the year 2088, explore every detail of how the station�s crew lived and worked, finding the clues that add up to a gripping story of trust, fear, and resolve in the face of disaster.

Name: The Pirate's Fate
Description: Embark on a swashbuckling adventure in The Pirate's Fate, a visual novel experience with a unique twist: the story, the crew, and who you are transform based on your choices. Seek treasure, find love, and choose your fate.

Name: The Witcher 3: Wild Hunt
Description: You are Geralt of Rivia, a monster hunter for hire. A war-torn, monster-infested continent lies at your feet. Your next contract: find   the Child of Prophecy, Ciri � a living weapon capable of shaping the fate of the world.

Name: Hot Tin Roof: The Cat That Wore A Fedora
Description: You�re the Private Investigator on a string of grisly murders, scouring for clues in a 3D side-scrolling world. Grab your fedora and revolver - in Hot Tin Roof you�re on the case! Dive into a noir mystery and become Emma Jones, the only PI partnered to a cat named Franky.

Name: Firewatch
Description: Firewatch is a single-player first-person mystery set in the Wyoming wilderness, where your only emotional lifeline is the person on the other end of a handheld radio.

Name: Pillars of Eternity
Description: Prepare to be enchanted by a world where the choices you make and the paths you choose shape your destiny. Obsidian Entertainment, the developer of Fallout: New Vegas� and South Park: The Stick of Truth�, together with Paradox Interactive is proud to present Pillars of Eternity.

Name: Dreamfall Chapters
Description: The Final Cut is the ultimate collector's edition of Dreamfall Chapters, a story-driven 3D adventure about choice and consequence, set in parallel worlds: a cyberpunk vision of the future and a magical fantasy realm.

Name: Transistor
Description: Discover the world of Transistor, a sci-fi-themed action RPG from the creators of Bastion.

Name: SUNLESS SEA
Description: LOSE YOUR MIND. EAT YOUR CREW. DIE. Take the helm of your steamship and set sail for the unknown! Sunless Sea is a game of discovery, loneliness and frequent death, set in the award-winning Victorian Gothic universe of Fallen London.

Name: Hatoful Boyfriend
Description: Congratulations! You�ve been accepted as the only human student at the prestigious St. PigeoNation�s Institute, a school for talented birds! Roam the halls and find love in between classes as a sophomore student at the world�s greatest pigeon high school.

Name: Assassin's Creed� Syndicate
Company: Ubisoft Quebec, in collaboration with Ubisoft Annecy, Bucharest, Kiev, Montreal, Montpellier, Shanghai, Singapore, Sofia, Toronto studios
Description: London, 1868. In the heart of the Industrial Revolution, lead your underworld organization and grow your influence to fight those who exploit the less privileged in the name of progress

Name: Saints Row IV: Re-Elected
Description: Experience madness at its finest in Saints Row IV. The Saints have gone from penthouses to the White House � but Earth has been invaded, and now you must save the day using superpowers and bizarre weapons in the craziest open-world game ever.

Name: Valkyria Chronicles�
Description: The critically acclaimed Valkyria Chronicles is now available on PC in 1080p True HD, including all previously released DLC!

Name: Mass Effect (2007)
Description: As Commander Shepard, you lead an elite squad on a heroic, action-packed adventure throughout the galaxy.

Name: Fallout 2: A Post Nuclear Role Playing Game
Description: Fallout� 2 is the sequel to the critically acclaimed game that took role-playing out of the dungeons and into a dynamic, post-apocalyptic retro-future. It's been 80 long years since your ancestors walked the wasteland.

Name: Fable Anniversary
Description: FOR EVERY CHOICE, A CONSEQUENCE.Fully re-mastered with HD visuals and audio, Fable Anniversary is a stunning rendition of the original game that will delight faithful fans and new players alike! The all new Heroic difficulty setting will test the mettle of even the most hardcore Fable fan.

Name: Undertale
Description: UNDERTALE! The RPG game where you don't have to destroy anyone.

Name: The Yawhg
Description: The Yawhg is a one-to-four player choose-your-own-adventure game that randomizes a unique story every time you play. The evil Yawhg is returning. How will the town�s locals lead their lives in the meanwhile, and what will they do when the dreaded Yawhg finally arrives?

Name: Gone Home
Description: June 7th, 1995. 1:15 AM. You arrive home after a year abroad. You expect your family to greet you, but the house is empty. Something's not right. Where is everyone? And what's happened here? Unravel the mystery for yourself in Gone Home, a story exploration game from The Fullbright Company.

Name: The Sims� 3
Description: The Sims 3: Create the perfect world with full customization at your fingertips. Refine personalities and help fulfill destinies.

Name: Life is Strange: Before the Storm Remastered
Description: Life is Strange: Before the Storm returns with remastered visuals across characters & environments.

Name: In Other Waters
Description: Play as an Artificial Intelligence guiding a stranded xenobiologist through a beautiful and mysterious alien ocean. A non-violent sci-fi story, enter a world of wonder, fear and vulnerability, unraveling the history and ecology of an impossible planet. What will you discover together?

Name: Ikenfell
Description: A turn-based tactical RPG about a group of troublesome magic students. Use timing mechanics to power your spells and block attacks, explore the twisted halls of a vast magic school, fight challenging monsters and bosses, and uncover dark secrets never meant to be found.

Name: Summer in Mara
Description: Take care of your own island and sail with your boat in this cozy farming adventure! Relax and unwind exploring a tropical archipelago or harvesting your own crops while helping others. Discover the story of Summer in Mara, with farming, crafting and exploring mechanics.

Name: Dream Daddy: A Dad Dating Simulator
Description: Dream Daddy: A Dad Dating Simulator is a game where you play as a Dad and your goal is to meet and romance other hot Dads. Are you ready? Hi ready, I'm Dad.

Name: No Longer Home
Description: No Longer Home is a game about letting go of the life you've built due to circumstances beyond your control. Immerse yourself in the lives of Bo and Ao and learn about their dreams, frustrations and fears. Welcome the magic of the everyday and somewhat extraordinary.

Name: The Cat Lady
Description: The Cat Lady follows Susan Ashworth, a lonely 40-year old on the verge of suicide. She has no family, no friends and no hope for a better future. One day she discovers that five strangers will come along and change everything...

Name: Logitech G Pro X Gaming Headset 7.1
Description: The Logitech G Pro X Gaming Headset delivers next-level audio with immersive 7.1 surround sound, Blue VO!CE microphone technology, and pro-grade comfort � built for competitive gamers who demand precision and clarity.

Name: Logitech G Astro A50 Gen 5 LIGHTSPEED Wireless Gaming Headset
Description: The Logitech G Astro A50 Gen 5 delivers premium wireless audio with ultra-low latency via LIGHTSPEED technology, Dolby Audio support, and all-day comfort � designed for elite gamers who want total freedom and crystal-clear sound

Name: Sennheiser HD 660S2
Description: The Sennheiser HD 660S2 offers audiophile-grade sound with rich bass, detailed mids, and silky-smooth highs. Designed for passionate listeners, these open-back headphones deliver an immersive and natural listening experience.

Name: Razer Naga V2 Pro
Description: The Razer Naga V2 Pro is a versatile wireless gaming mouse with swappable side plates, up to 20 programmable buttons, and HyperScroll Pro Wheel � perfect for MMOs, MOBAs, and everything in between.

Name: SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL Gen 3 Wireless (Nordic)
Description: The SteelSeries Apex Pro TKL Gen 3 Wireless delivers lightning-fast performance with OmniPoint 2.0 adjustable switches, a compact tenkeyless design, and dual wireless connectivity � built for competitive gaming with pro-level precision.

Name: Keychron Q5 Max QMK Wireless Mechanic Keyboard [Gateron Jupiter Brown] IS
Description: The Keychron Q5 Max is a premium wireless mechanical keyboard featuring Gateron Jupiter Brown switches, QMK/VIA support, and a full aluminum body. Designed for both productivity and customization, with seamless connectivity and a smooth typing experience.

Name: Konix Drakkar
Description: The Konix Drakkar series delivers affordable, stylish gaming gear � including headsets with powerful sound and bundles with backlit keyboards and responsive mice, perfect for casual and entry-level gamers..

Name: Might and Magic II - BIG BOX
Description: A classic RPG in its original packaging, perfect for collectors of vintage Apple and Mac games. Note: Not compatible with PC.

Name: Might and Magic VI Bigbox - Japan
Description: The legendary RPG in its rare Japanese big box release � a true collector�s gem for fans of classic fantasy adventures.
